objects.text:
7-Quart Capacity (9+ Servings)
Digital Countdown Timer
Travel-Proof Locking Lid
Dishwasher Safe Parts

product_details.description: Whether you’re feeding friends and family at home, or taking your meal on the go or to an event, the Crockpot 7 QT Cook & Carry Programmable Slow Cooker makes sharing a home-cooked meal with loved ones easy and effortless. The Cook & Carry travel-proof locking lid provides a tight seal to prevent leaks and spills, for no mess on the go, and convenient handles make it easy to carry and take your favorite slow cooked meals anywhere. A digital countdown control allows you to easily program your slow cooker from 30 minutes up to 20 hours. When cooking is completed, temperature automatically shifts to warm mode to avoid overcooking. The digital display also lets you track your meal progress and monitor remaining cook time. With a 7-quart capacity, it cooks meals for 9+ people, perfect for feeding a crowd. When you’re finished slow cooking, both the lid and the stoneware can be placed in the dishwasher for easy cleanup.

banner_details:
The banner showcases a promotional design for a kitchen appliance, presented in a modern diagonal split background with rich gradients. The left side features a dark bluish-slate hue while the right portion contrasts with a soft terra-cotta gradient. Positioned prominently is an image of the product (id: `product_image`), partly overlapping both sections for visual balance. The top-left corner displays a bold futuristic logo (id: `heading`) followed by a dual-line subheading (id: `subheading`) introducing the product type. Midway down are key features listed in a clean sans-serif font (id: `description`). A bold price label (id: `price`) increases visibility, while a call-to-action button (id: `cta_button`) with inviting text (id: `cta`) is placed below.

**Color Palette:**
- Slate Blue: `#3E4A56`
- Cool Gray Blue: `#607D8B`
- Terra Cotta: `#B85C38`
- Warm Peach: `#E5B299`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern Crockpot in a matte grey finish. The dominant color is a neutral charcoal grey (#6D6E71), offering a contemporary and professional aesthetic. Accents of white (#FFFFFF) on the lid trim and control panel create contrast and visual clarity. Subtle tones of light grey (#D1D3D4) on the LCD screen and buttons introduce depth without overwhelming the minimalist design. The glass lid reflects soft highlights, enhancing its premium look. These colors are well-blended with clean separations that emphasize functionality. Recommended ad palette: charcoal grey, white, light grey, and a touch of warm beige (#F5F5DC) for warmth.
